reviews.subject: Introduction to Computer Science
reviews.review: Great professor, explains concepts clearly and is very approachable.

reviews.review: Amazing lectures and very helpful during office hours.

reviews.review: Challenging course, but the professor is knowledgeable.

reviews.review: Very organized and always available to help.

reviews.review: Incredible teacher, made complex topics easy to understand.

reviews.review: A very challenging course, but highly rewarding.

reviews.review: Good content, but the assignments were overwhelming.

reviews.review: Course content is good, but lectures can be dry.

reviews.review: Innovative and engaging lectures, highly recommended.
